member.name: IConnectableCredentialProviderCredential.Connect
member.summary: Connects an object. This method is called after the user clicks the Submit button within the Pre-Logon-Access Provider screen and before is called.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IConnectableCredentialProviderCredential.Disconnect
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IConnectableCredentialProviderCredential
member.summary: Exposes methods for connecting and disconnecting IConnectableCredentialProviderCredential objects.
